title: Sponsors
description: Gåsebäck Film Festival is an independently funded film culture event. The festival is only possible due to the generous support of Helsingborg Stad, Film I Skåne and Master Mechanic Films AB.
heading: Sponsors

children.value: Gåsebäck Film Festival is an independently funded film culture event. The festival is only possible due to the generous support of Helsingborg Stad, Film I Skåne and Master Mechanic Films AB.
And v﻿ery special thanks to our friends at Revelop for the venue sponsorship!
If you would like to support the festival or become a sponsor please email us:
